trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

trait.name: Death Before Dishonor
entries: The body of a creature War Born creates a lethal poison that kills in 2 turns in case it is captured by enemies. Consider captured qhen it is under condition of {@condition paralyzed} or {@condition restrained} and there is no free allies nearby and the battle is over. The creation of the poison is an {@condition unconscious} response of War Born and cannot be avoided. The use of magic that removes the effect of the poison before the pass of 2 turns remove permanently this condition. However, the magic must be applied after the effect has begun.

trait.name: Dedicated Loyalty
entries: Creatures War Born have advantage on saving throws agains being {@condition charmed}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Gnoll makes two attacks, one with its spear or Battleaxe and one bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Gnolls nascidos da guerra têm um aspecto maior do que outros gnolls, com olhos espelhados e sem pupilas. As cataratas que cobrem seus olhos são estriadas com veias vermelho-sangue, um sinal do batismo no Caldeirão de Mistura. Seus corpos são resistentes a dano, e pequenos ferimentos como os infligidos por armas perfurantes fecham rapidamente, diminuindo a perda de sangue. Gnolls nascidos da guerra levam consigo armas de boa qualidade e vestem armaduras ultrapassadas, mas em boas condições. Um teste de Inteligência CD 10 (Investigação) determina que suas armas e armaduras são de qualidade muito superior do que aquelas geralmente carregadas por gnolls comuns. Gnolls nascidos da guerra morrem caso capturados, fazendo com que interrogá-los se torne praticamente impossível.
